integration-with-nuxt-js/index.title: Integration with Nuxt.js
integration-with-nuxt-js/index.description: Using Vue UI Kit, you can integrate your Nuxt.js application with CometChat.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: V4 UI kits offer modular design, extended functionality & > customization for a tailored chat experience. Check out our new UIKits here.

UI Components/index.title: UI Components
